title: From Graz to Glenroy
creator_credit: Elfrieda Senycia, Viv Mehes and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: This story explores the journey of migration from Austria to Australia for Elfrida and her husband. As they rebuild life in a new country they deal with triumps and disappointments including the humiliation of never having their qualifications recognised in Australia.
creator_credit_for_label: Elfrieda Senycia, Viv Mehes and ACMI Digital Storytelling
